channel.title: Editing testscape
channel.description: how do you edit the default client? I mean, like change the scenery, monsters, npc's, etc. And also is there a program involved? and what program did the runescape creator use? yeah! ive always wanted to know that.

item.title: Editing testscape
item.dc:creator: @Unid_H4x0r Unid H4x0r
item.description:
@Unid_H4x0r wrote:

GoreScape:

how do you edit the default client? I mean, like change the scenery, monsters, npc’s, etc.

You have to KNOw how to edit cache and pack them again. Challenging. And jdk= java development kit. YES you do need it!

Read full topic

item.title: Editing testscape
item.dc:creator: @runescape3 runescape3
item.description:
@runescape3 wrote:

lol netbeans is funny name lol =P is that a type of java?

and runescape used there bare hands to type the coding of the server and client theres not realy a program or anything its just like a private server only more stuff and more advanced coding and yes jdk 6 is used to run the server and compiler hope i was helpfull!

Read full topic
